introduction: Cornelius C. BrownNickname	NBJHeight	5' 9" (1.75 m)Mini Bio (1)Born in a rough neighborhood to strict, but loving parents. Neil Brown, Jr, who was a gifted martial artist and self proclaimed "knucklehead ", received his first role in film purely by chance, when a producer Patty Thomas Robinson walked into his karate Dojo looking for a kid to be in the TV series WMAC masters, which was being shot in Orlando, FL . After catching " the acting bug" during filming, Neil claims he never looked back, and has been acting ever since.- IMDb Mini Biography By: Mercedes-carrollSpouse (1)Catrina Robinson Brown	(23 April 2000 - present) ( 2 children)Trade Mark (1)Split right eyebrow from a car accident when he was fourTrivia (10)He has won numerous martial arts trophies and awards.Started Training in Shotokan/Shotokai Karate.Has also trained in Wing Chung gung fu, Wah Lum, Jujutsu, Judo, Tae Kwan Do, and Capoeira.Assistant instructor of the Chojiro Ryu style of Shotokai karate.Been hit by a car three times (not at the same time) and survived with only minor scratches,including the one which splits his eyebrow in two. Graduated from Oak Ridge High school in Orlando, Florida.Graduated from Oak Ridge Highschool in Orlando, Florida class of 1998.Does voice impressions of just about everyone he meets with great accuracy.Resides in Los Angeles, CA.Wrapped on Mr. 3000 [August 2003]Has two sons.
